function.description: Returns the phase angle (or angular component) of the complex number x, expressed in radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/arg/]
Returns the phase angle (or angular component) of the complex number x, expressed in radians. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/arg/]
Returns the norm value of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/norm/]
Returns the norm value of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/norm/]
Returns the conjugate of the complex number x. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/conj/]

Returns a complex object (in cartesian format) corresponding to the complex number defined by its polar components rho and theta. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/polar/]
function.prototype: public complex64 polar(float64 rho, float64 theta)

function.description: Returns a complex object (in cartesian format) corresponding to the complex number defined by its polar components rho and theta. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/polar/]
function.prototype: public complex32 polar(float32 rho, float32 theta)

function.description: Returns the projection of the complex number x onto the Riemann sphere. Underlying function: [http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/complex/proj/]
